survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' awareness of cybersecurity threats and their adherence to best practices in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How often do you receive cybersecurity training from your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you receive cybersecurity training from your organization?

questions.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity threats are you most concerned about? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include 'None of the above' to capture all responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity threats are you most concerned about? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Do you use a password manager to store and manage your passwords?
answer_options: I don't know what a password manager is
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Include an option for respondents unfamiliar with password managers.

script.question_text: Do you use a password manager to store and manage your passwords?
answer_options: I don't know what a password manager is

questions.question_text: How often do you update your passwords for work-related accounts?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Yes' or 'No' to Q3
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Ensure options cover a range of frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you update your passwords for work-related accounts?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Yes' or 'No' to Q3

questions.question_text: Describe any challenges you face in following cybersecurity best practices at work.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Describe any challenges you face in following cybersecurity best practices at work.

questions.question_text: Have you ever encountered a cybersecurity incident (e.g., phishing email, malware) at work?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Include an option for uncertain respondents.

script.question_text: Have you ever encountered a cybersecurity incident (e.g., phishing email, malware) at work?

questions.question_text: If you encountered a cybersecurity incident, how did you report it? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an 'Other' option for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: If you encountered a cybersecurity incident, how did you report it? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How confident are you in identifying a phishing email?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with a Likert scale for confidence levels.

script.question_text: How confident are you in identifying a phishing email?

questions.question_text: Does your organization have a clear policy for handling cybersecurity incidents?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess policy awareness.

script.question_text: Does your organization have a clear policy for handling cybersecurity incidents?

questions.question_text: What additional cybersecurity training or resources would you find helpful?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional cybersecurity training or resources would you find helpful?
